results.title: Kurt Russell and Goldie Hawn, a.k.a. Mr. and Mrs. Claus
results.abstract: Together 37 years but rarely paired onscreen, the real-life couple’s new Netflix holiday movie is an indication of how they — and Hollywood — have changed.

results.title: ‘Collective’ Review: When Tragedy Consumes a Nation
results.abstract: The shocking Romanian documentary “Collective” revisits a 2015 fire that killed scores of people and brought down the government.

results.abstract: For his second feature, Ashe, the writer and director of the Amazon film, was influenced by the photographer Gordon Parks and the singer Nancy Wilson.

results.title: Nelly Kaplan, Whose Films Explored Female Strength, Dies at 89
results.abstract: An Argentine who relocated to France, she drew acclaim with “A Very Curious Girl” and other films about female characters who empowered themselves.

results.title: Tracey Davis, Chronicler of Ups and Downs With Her Famous Father, Dies at 59
results.abstract: In two books, she described Sammy Davis Jr.’s negligent parenting but also celebrated the intimate moments she shared with him toward the end of his life.

results.title: Soumitra Chatterjee, Globally Acclaimed Indian Film Star, Dies at 85
results.abstract: His roles in classic movies directed by Satyajit Ray won him admiration from cinephiles and made him a hero to his fellow Bengalis.

results.title: Are Streamed Plays Theater or TV? Unions Settle a Dispute
results.abstract: Actors’ Equity and SAG-AFTRA’s agreement clears the way for more entertainment during the pandemic winter.

results.title: ‘Belushi’ Finds the Sensitive Man Inside the Wild Persona
results.abstract: The new Showtime documentary aims to present a more complex view of John Belushi, the tragically fated star of “Animal House,” “The Blues Brothers” and “S.N.L.,” beyond the stunts and hard partying.

multimedia.caption: “One of the important aspirations was to capture the lightness and the joy that John not only experienced but that he brought to the world,” said R.J. Cutler, the director of a new documentary about John Belushi.

“One of the important aspirations was to capture the lightness and the joy that John not only experienced but that he brought to the world,” said R.J. Cutler, the director of a new documentary about John Belushi.

results.title: ‘Harry Potter’ and the Prisoners of Quarantine
results.abstract: On TikTok, Gen Z “Harry Potter” fans edit themselves into the movies in a quest for escapism, representation and community.

multimedia.caption: Marjorie Law always wished she could go to Hogwarts. “With the magic of technology, I can see myself there,” she said. She and other fans have found a niche on TikTok.
